DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of dutogliptin in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) who are receiving background therapy of glimepiride with or without metformin.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Dutogliptin in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (T2DM) on Background Therapy With Glimepiride With or Without Metformin
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus, diagnosed at least 3 months prior to Screening (Visit 1) BMI 20 to 48 kg/m2, inclusive HbA1c 7.0% 10.0%, inclusive Age 18 to 85 years, inclusive Currently on 3 or more oral antidiabetic drugs or insulin. Type 1 diabetes mellitus
